These Skeletons can be found in the sixth room of the Lumbridge Catacombs which can only be entered after completing The Blood Pact quest. They are different from normal skeletons as they have a blue glow in their chest and mouth as opposed to a green one. They were created by Dragith Nurn, a now undead necromancer, during his experiments with stolen corpses.

This is one of the monsters that drop Mask part 3, which can be used with the 4 other parts to create the Mask of Dragith Nurn.

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • My Skeleton Can Beat Up Your Skeleton ( 5) – Have a Skeleton Warrior conjured while fighting a skeleton.

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 5 July 2010 (Update):
    • The new skeletons and goblins in the Lumbridge Catacombs can now also drop champion scrolls.
  • update 15 March 2010 (Update):
    • Added to game.
